title: Stopwatch For Android Wear

description: Stopwatch for Android Wear is a feature rich precision stopwatch to measure elapsed time with lap times. It is great for timing sport events and contests as well as just timing your activities or measure an event duration. Current lap time, best lap time and statistics make this app the ideal stopwatch for runners and athletes. This app is also simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start stopwatch. descriptionHTML:
Stopwatch for Android Wear is a feature rich precision stopwatch to measure elapsed time with lap times. It is great for timing sport events and contests as well as just timing your activities or measure an event duration. Current lap time, best lap time and statistics make this app the ideal stopwatch for runners and athletes. This app is also simple and easy to use and a great helper for on the go. Download now for free. To start the app. Just say: OK Google...Start stopwatch.


Get more apps, games & news about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features:
★ Simple and intuitive interface
★ Lap function
★ 1/1000ths second
★ Current lap time display
★ Last lap time display
★ Best lap time display


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "Stopwatch" or say "Start stopwatch"


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: Better then stock... but not great It'll do splits so you can see multiple individual times, BUT it doesn't show the cumulative time.  For instance if you are doing a workout with timed segments you'll only get each segment time, not the total :(

Pretty good Nice interface - big easy to press buttons for lap times.  If this showed the cumulative time and lap # on the main screen (can't find cumulative time anywhere), then this would be a 5-star app.
Not bad! Keeps the screen on, which devours battery over a long session. Needs an update to follow the device's screen behavior.

Good, but missing a few features. First of all, it doesn't count the last lap (when you hit stop instead of lap) as the fastest lap, even if it was the fastest. Second, I want it to show me the total time, not just the individual laps. Third, a dim screen would help save battery life. Other than that, it works.
Dissapointing Good chunky main display and vibration, but no pause and no background-running.
Like it! Would be awesome if it had cumulative time for split timing & export times feature / history
